name: munger
description: probably should have just learned sed

scripts.test: npx tsc; node test.js; node filetest.js
scripts.build: npx tsc && npx esbuild --bundle --outfile=bundle.js ui.js && npx tsc --build --clean
scripts.build:prod: npx tsc && npx esbuild --bundle --minify --outfile=bundle.js ui.js && npx tsc --build --clean

author: Tom Theisen
